#summary What games everyone is going to play.

= Introduction =

We need to play a total of ten games, one from each of ten categories, and do a writeup of its merits (roughly 3 graf).

= Details =

  * *Physical:* Jenga (Eugene),
  * *Narrative:* Deus Ex (Eugene),
  * *Social:* LambdaMOO (Eugene),
  * *Emergent Behavior:* GTA (Eugene),
  * *Visual Aesthetics:* Loop (Eugene),
  * *Accessibility:* Bejeweled (Eugene - demo), Super Mario World (Eugene),
  * *Real time:* HalfLife 2 (Eugene), Ragdoll Kung Fu (Eugene - demo),
  * *Management:* Civilization 4 (Zach),
  * *Concrete Content:* Oregon Trail (Eugene), 
  * *Creativity:* Second Life (Eugene),
